Title: War of the Worlds
Writer: Josh Friedman (screenplay), David Koepp (screenplay), H.G. Wells (novel)
Actors: Tom Cruise, Dakota Fanning, Miranda Otto, Justin Chatwin
Plot: An updated version of H.G Wells' seminal sci-fi classic about an alien invasion threatening the future of humanity. The catastrophic nightmare is depicted through the eyes of one American family fighting for survival.
Awards: Nominated for 3 Oscars. Another 16 wins & 46 nominations.
